pr_title: Convert arithmetic scalars to new signature registry

timeline.message:
Convert arithmetic scalars to new signature registry

By using signature matching of arithmetic scalars, arithmetic data type
selection is based on precedence and thus fixes existing issues for
floating point arithmetics.
Operations on non-floating point column types with a floating point
literal will result in a floating point result now.

Fixes #9652

timeline.bodyText: do we still need to check whether the intersecting from and to type parameters are compatible or the size check would be enough?

replies.bodyText:
Currently no test required to check for object inner type compatibility. Thats why I went just with size comparison as it popped up when working with untyped and typed objects.
I'd keep that in mind and only add later on if really required.
